messages.title: YOUR SCOTTISH CONSERVATIVE AND UNIONIST CANDIDATE FOR NORTH EAST FIFE
messages.content: Nicola Sturgeon wants to hold another independence referendum next year, and Jeremy Corbyn has said his Labour Party won't even stand in the way of one taking place. So this election could be our last chance to stop that referendum, but to do that we all need to stand behind one candidate who can beat Nicola Sturgeon and the SNP. A message they can't ignore.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum.
End the Parliamentary stalemate and get the nation moving again.
Invest in primary NHS care and maintain a full range of services in both Cupar and St. Andrews hospitals.
Make sure that Agriculture, Tourism, Fishing, and St. Andrews University can thrive in a modern dynamic environment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Scottish Conservatives are strong enough to take on the SNP.

issues.governance: End the Parliamentary stalemate and get the nation moving again.
issues.health: Invest in primary NHS care and maintain a full range of services in both Cupar and St. Andrews hospitals.

quotes.text: ... the Labour leader admitted he could grant a referendum if he was to win the General Election.
CORBYN ACCUSED OF PLOT TO BREAK UP BRITAIN
Corbyn could back new indyref ‘as early as 2021’

images.caption: TONY MIKLINSKI with local supporters and election campaign materials.
